description.value: Your ears are finely tuned, able to detect even the slightest whispers of sound. As long as you can hear normally, you can use the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} action to sense @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} creatures in a 60-foot cone instead of a 30-foot cone. You also gain a +2 circumstance bonus to locate @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} creatures that you could hear within 30 feet with a @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} action.
